means: 吞没( devour的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She devoured everything she could lay her hands on: books, magazines and newspapers.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论是书、杂志，还是报纸，只要能弄得到，她都看得津津有味。

sentence.Network_en: The lions devoured a zebra in a short time.
sentence.Network_cn: 狮子一会儿就吃掉了一匹斑马.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he devoured work , never shirking and always beating the native sailors in jumping obey a command .他贪婪地干着，从不畏缩，每次都抢在土人水手前面接受命令。
the horse devoured the course before him .马以极快的速度跑完它的路程。
I devoured my bread and drank my coffee ., 我狼吞虎咽地吃下了面包 , 喝下了咖啡.
She devoured his novels ., 她如饥似渴的阅读他的小说.

list.abs: flames devoured the structure in minutes .几分钟内大火吞噬了整个建筑物。
gas devourer 消除油轮残余气体工具gas devourer 油舱除气装置gas discharge cell 气体放电电池
159 气焰硬焊 gas brazing160 蒸汽驱气器 gas devourer161 气化 gasification
not developers no appetite , who is not a big capacity flatly devour it , and now , many investors favored so that she is a VIP .――并不是开发商没有胃口，实在是没有谁有那么大的能力一口吃掉它，而现在，众多投资商的青睐使她成为一个显要之地。
We watched the flames devour the entire building ., 我们看着火苗吞噬整座大楼.

entry.def: If a person or animal devours something, they eat it quickly and eagerly.

example.ex: A medium-sized dog will devour at least one can of food per day...
example.tran: 中型犬每天至少要吃掉一罐狗粮。

example.ex: She devoured half an apple pie.
example.tran: 她狼吞虎咽地吃下了半个苹果派。

entry.tran: 如饥似渴地阅读;热切地看
entry.def: If you devour a book or magazine, for example, you read it quickly and with great enthusiasm.

example.ex: She began devouring newspapers when she was only 12.
example.tran: 年仅 12 岁时，她就开始如饥似渴地阅读报纸。

means.word_mean: 1. destroyed or wasted as if by eating;

auth_sentence.content: She hungrily devoured a disgustingly rare chunk of steak.
auth_sentence.res_content: She hungrily devoured a disgustingly rare chunk of steak.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She hungrily devoured a disgustingly rare chunk of steak.

auth_sentence.content: Or relive a particularly delicious meal devoured the previous day.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or relive a particularly delicious meal devoured the previous day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or relive a particularly delicious meal devoured the previous day.

auth_sentence.content: The entire galaxy may be devoured by a black hole.
auth_sentence.res_content: The entire galaxy may be devoured by a black hole.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The entire galaxy may be devoured by a black hole.
